Class Library

java.lang.Object
lms.Library
public class Library extends Object
Contains core library logic. Includes book removals, additions, check out, check in, and getting book.
Version:
1.0.0 11/19/2024
Author:
Neil Elkadi

  • Method Details

    • printAll

      public static void printAll()
      Prints all book records that are held in the database.

    • addBooks

      public static void addBooks()
      Adds a random set of books for testing.

    • addBook

      public static boolean addBook(int id, String author, String title, String genre)
      Adds a new book entry to the library database if the barcode ID does not already exist.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique barcode ID for the book.
      author - The author's name.
      title - The title of the book.
      genre - The genre or category of the book.
      Returns:
      true if the book was added successfully, false if the book ID already exists.

    • getBook

      public static Book getBook(String title)
      Retrieves a book from the database by title.
      Parameters:
      title - The title field of the book to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      The book if found, or null otherwise.

    • getBook

      public static Book getBook(int id)
      Retrieves a book from database by id.
      Parameters:
      id - The id field of the book to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      The book if found, or null otherwise.

    • removeBook

      public static void removeBook(int id)
      Removes a book from database by id.
      Parameters:
      id - The id field of the book to be removed.

    • removeBook

      public static void removeBook(String title)
      Overload that Removes a book from database by title.
      Parameters:
      title - The title field of the book to be removed.

    • toggleStatus

      public static boolean toggleStatus(String title)
      Marks a book as being checked out in database by title.
      Parameters:
      title - The title field of the book to be checked out.

    • checkinBook

      public static boolean checkinBook(String title)
      Marks a book as being checked in for the database array by title.
      Parameters:
      title - The title field of the book to be checked in.
